answerText: Octavio Paz[10] In addition to the poem "Sunstone," Paz wrote this aforementioned collection, perhaps his best known work, that also contains "Conquest and Colonialism."
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 11 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote a long poem based on the Aztec calendar that begins with the image of "a crystal willow, a poplar of water." For 10 points each: [10] Name this author whose time as his country's ambassador to India inspired his book The Monkey Grammarian. He also wrote a collection of nine essays including "The Sons of La Malinche."
